EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_MonolithicTransformation_eBook_Q119.Download Confirma
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Monolithic Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Monolithic Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/monolithic-transformation]]> by Pivotal’s Michael Coté. We hope you find it useful as you investigate serverless technology options for your cloud-native journey.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
